name: Georg Weissenbacher
content: Georg Weissenbacher ☰ contact about research publications Georg WeissenbacherDPhil (Oxon) TU Wien Institute of Logic and Computation Formal Methods in Systems Engineering Favoritenstraße 9-11/192-4 A-1040 Vienna, Austria georg.weissenbachertuwien.ac.at @GeorgWeissenbacher@fediscience.org Selected publications Boolean Satisfiability Solvers and Their Applications in Model Checking, with Y.
